33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Az-Zubair bin 'Adi said:"We entered upon Anas bin Malik. We complained to him about what we were experiencing from Al-Hajjaj. So he said: 'There will not be a year, except that the one that is after it will be more evil than it, until you meet your Lord. I heard this from your Prophet(s.a.w)

chapter.eng-name: Something Else: There Shall Not Come A Time Except That The One After It Is More Evil Than It
